com.camerontec.catalys.util.fast

Interface IFastContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardFastContext

    public interface IFastContext
    An instance of this interface encapsulates the context in which FAST encoding and decoding takes place.

    The context includes:

    • The rules (templates) which drive encoding and decoding
    • The set of dictionaries containing previous values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Clears all dictionaries.

      Global dictionary associated with this context.

      Implicit field associated with template identifiers.
      ITemplateRegistry getTemplateRegistry()
      Template registry allowing lookup of templates given their FAST "Template Identifier".
      ITemplates getTemplates()
      Returns complete set of templates.
      ITemplateSelector getTemplateSelector()
      Returns class to be used for selecting which template should be used to encode a message.
      void setDecodeInputStream(InputStream inputStream)
      Input stream from which FAST data to be decoded is read.
      void setDecodeLogStream(OutputStream logStream)
      Log stream associated with input in this context - may be null (default).
      void setDecodeSpy(ISpy spy)
      Spy used for analyzing decoding - may be null (default).
      void setEncodeSpy(ISpy spy)
      Spy used for analyzing encoding - may be null (default).

      • getTemplateSelector

        ITemplateSelector getTemplateSelector()
                               throws TemplateException
        Returns class to be used for selecting which template should be used to encode a message.
        Returns:
        ITemplateSelector object.
        Throws:
        TemplateException - If the specified or defaulted selector is unsuitable.

      • getTemplateIdentifierField

        IField getTemplateIdentifierField()
        Implicit field associated with template identifiers.

        "A template identifier is represented as an Unsigned Integer in the stream. ...A template identifier is encoded as if a copy operator was specified. The operator uses the global dictionary and has an internal key common to all template identifier fields."

        Returns:
        Field used to encode/decode template identifiers.

      • getTemplateRegistry

        ITemplateRegistry getTemplateRegistry()
        Template registry allowing lookup of templates given their FAST "Template Identifier".
        Returns:
        ITemplateRegistry

      • setDecodeLogStream

        void setDecodeLogStream(OutputStream logStream)
        Log stream associated with input in this context - may be null (default).
        Parameters:
        logStream - Output stream used for logging all input.

      • setDecodeSpy

        void setDecodeSpy(ISpy spy)
        Spy used for analyzing decoding - may be null (default).
        Parameters:
        spy - Decoding spy.

      • setDecodeInputStream

        void setDecodeInputStream(InputStream inputStream)
        Input stream from which FAST data to be decoded is read.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Input stream containing encoded FAST data to be decoded.

      • setEncodeSpy

        Spy used for analyzing encoding - may be null (default).
        Parameters:
        spy - Encoding spy.
